quotes.quote: Einstein was a giant. His head was in the clouds, but his feet were on the ground. Those of us who are not so tall have to choose!
It is excellent To have a giant's strength, but it is tyrannous To use it like a giant.
There is a giant asleep within every man. When that giant awakes, miracles happen.
Lots of small steps equates to a giant leap.
You are not for any reason less than whom God created you to be, don't live like a dwarf where you are seen as a giant.
If I have seen further than others, it is by standing upon the shoulders of giants.
Life is never more fun than when you're the underdog competing against the giants.
You can’t out-spend the giants, but you can out-think, out-teach, and out-help them.
Nature intends all men and women to be mental and spiritual giants, and does not intend that any one should follow the will of another.
We are all now connected by the Internet, like neurons in a giant brain.
Most people have no idea of the giant capacity we can immediately command when we focus all of our resources on mastering a single area of our lives.
Gratitude for the seemingly insignificant—a seed—this plants the giant miracle.
Remember that small steps can create giant leaps over time, so never think of any financial or spending matter as a small one.

Fear is like a giant fog. It sits on your brain and blocks everything - real feelings, true happiness, real joy. They can't get through that fog. But you lift it, and buddy, you're in for the ride of your life.
